It depicts the confusion of people who cannot escape from a 2-minute loop of time>./> ◎ Plot: The plot revolves around the lives of ordinary people caught in a two-minute time loop that repeats itself endlessly. Set against the backdrop of a winter retreat, these characters experience small love stories along their journey. =====================================
